title: The A17 Pro iPad mini is back down to its best-ever price
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for an ultra-portable, light, and long-lasting tablet with incredible performance and a gorgeous screen at a great price, look no further: Amazon is selling the iPad mini A17 Pro for $100 off today, bringing the price down to $399, its very best yet.

This 8.3-inch tablet is faster than previous models as the A17 Pro chip and 8GB of RAM is ready for Apple Intelligence. Other parts of this laptop are equally impressive, including the gorgeous Liquid Retina display and 12MP Center Stage camera that’s perfect for capturing videos or joining Zoom calls. You’ll also get great battery life that lasts for up to 10 hours on a single charge, which we particularly loved when we reviewed the A17 Pro. Finally, it comes with 128GB of storage, more than enough space to install apps, games, movies, music, and photos.

So stop wasting time and get Apple’s newest tiny tablet for $100 off while this deal still stands.
